name: DYSM
description:
Mirrors, laser, refraction, ... And if we had already done the trick of these enigmas?

In Dysm, rediscover the challenge of mirror puzzles, only better!

To escape a (clearly enchanted) mansion, the laser will have to make its way from dice to dice to activate portals. 

Simple? Not really. The owner of the place, (obviously obsessed with numbers), has created (enchanted) mechanisms based on the faces of the dice and the numbers that decorate them.

Will you be able to unlock the secret of this mansion,  and escape from it?
